006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.tools.cli.core.commands;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLFactory;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLFactoryBuilder;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLGenerator;
011
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.commands.MetaschemaCommands;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor.CallingContext;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitCode;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.AbstractTerminalCommand;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.CommandExecutionException;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ExtraArgument;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ICommandExecutor;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDefinitionNodeItem;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItemFactory;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IAllowedValue;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IAllowedValuesConstraint;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
029import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
030import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
031import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.IBoundModule;
032import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.OscalBindingContext;
033import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.OscalCompleteModule;
034import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.util.AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor;
035import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.util.AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor.AllowedValuesRecord;
036
037import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
038import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
039import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
040import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
041
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.io.PrintWriter;
044import java.io.StringWriter;
045import java.io.Writer;
046import java.net.URI;
047import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
048import java.nio.file.Files;
049import java.nio.file.Path;
050import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
051import java.util.Collection;
052import java.util.Comparator;
053import java.util.List;
054import java.util.Map;
055import java.util.Map.Entry;
056import java.util.Set;
057import java.util.TreeMap;
058import java.util.function.Function;
059import java.util.stream.Collectors;
060
061import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
062import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
063
064/**
065 * A CLI command that provides a listing of allowed values constraints by
066 * targeted node.
067 */
068@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
069public class ListAllowedValuesCommand
070    extends AbstractTerminalCommand {
071  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(ListAllowedValuesCommand.class);
072
073  @NonNull
074  private static final String COMMAND = "list-allowed-values";
075  @NonNull
076  private static final List<ExtraArgument> EXTRA_ARGUMENTS = ObjectUtils.notNull(List.of(
077      ExtraArgument.newInstance("destination-file", false)));
078  @NonNull
079  private static final Option CONSTRAINTS_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
080      Option.builder("c")
081          .hasArgs()
082          .argName("URL")
083          .desc("additional constraint definitions")
084          .build());
085
086  @Override
087  public String getName() {
088    return COMMAND;
089  }
090
091  @Override
092  public String getDescription() {
093    return "List allowed values constraints for the provided Metaschema module";
094  }
095
096  @SuppressWarnings("null")
097  @Override
098  public Collection<? extends Option> gatherOptions() {
099    return List.of(
100        CONSTRAINTS_OPTION,
101        MetaschemaCommands.OVERWRITE_OPTION);
102  }
103
104  @Override
105  public List<ExtraArgument> getExtraArguments() {
106    return EXTRA_ARGUMENTS;
107  }
108
109  @Override
110  public ICommandExecutor newExecutor(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine cmdLine) {
111    return ICommandExecutor.using(callingContext, cmdLine, this::executeCommand);
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Execute the list allowed values command.
116   *
117   * @param callingContext
118   *          information about the calling context
119   * @param cmdLine
120   *          the parsed command line details
121   * @throws CommandExecutionException
122   *           if an error occurred while executing the command
123   */
124  @SuppressWarnings({
125      "PMD.OnlyOneReturn", // readability
126      "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException",
127      "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
128      "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity"
129  })
130  protected void executeCommand(
131      @NonNull CallingContext callingContext,
132      @NonNull CommandLine cmdLine) throws CommandExecutionException {
133
134    List<String> extraArgs = cmdLine.getArgList();
135
136    Path destination = null;
137    if (!extraArgs.isEmpty()) {
138      destination = MetaschemaCommands.handleDestination(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(extraArgs.get(0)), cmdLine);
139    }
140
141    URI currentWorkingDirectory = ObjectUtils.notNull(getCurrentWorkingDirectory().toUri());
142    Set<IConstraintSet> constraintSets = MetaschemaCommands.loadConstraintSets(
143        cmdLine,
144        CONSTRAINTS_OPTION,
145        currentWorkingDirectory);
146
147    IBindingContext bindingContext;
148    IBoundModule module;
149    try {
150      bindingContext = OscalBindingContext.builder()
151          .constraintSet(constraintSets)
152          .build();
153      module = bindingContext.registerModule(OscalCompleteModule.class);
154    } catch (MetaschemaException ex) {
155      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.PROCESSING_ERROR,
156          String.format("Unable to register OSCAL module. %s", ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
157          ex);
158    } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
159      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.RUNTIME_ERROR,
160          String.format("Unable to initialize the binding context. %s", ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
161          ex);
162    }
163
164    try {
165      if (destination == null) {
166        Writer stringWriter = new StringWriter();
167        try (PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(stringWriter)) {
168          generateAllowedValuesList(module, writer, null);
169        }
170
171        // Print the result
172        if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
173          LOGGER.info(stringWriter.toString());
174        }
175      } else {
176        try (Writer writer = Files.newBufferedWriter(
177            destination,
178            StandardCharsets.UTF_8,
179            StandardOpenOption.CREATE,
180            StandardOpenOption.WRITE,
181            StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING)) {
182          try (PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer)) {
183            generateAllowedValuesList(module, printWriter, null);
184          }
185        }
186      }
187    } catch (IOException ex) {
188      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.IO_ERROR, ex);
189    } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
190      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.RUNTIME_ERROR, ex);
191    }
192  }
193
194  private static void generateAllowedValuesList(
195      @NonNull IModule module,
196      @NonNull PrintWriter writer,
197      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @Nullable String metapath) throws IOException {
198    AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor walker = new AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor();
199
200    StaticContext staticContext = StaticContext.builder()
201        .defaultModelNamespace(module.getXmlNamespace())
202        .build();
203
204    IModuleNodeItem moduleNodeItem = INodeItemFactory.instance().newModuleNodeItem(module);
205
206    // if (metapath != null) {
207    // MetapathExpression filter = MetapathExpression.compile(metapath,
208    // staticContext);
209    //
210    // DynamicContext dynamicContext = new DynamicContext(staticContext);
211    // ISequence<?> sequence = filter.evaluate(moduleNodeItem, dynamicContext);
212    // assert sequence != null;
213    // }
214
215    DynamicContext dynamicContext = new DynamicContext(staticContext);
216    dynamicContext.disablePredicateEvaluation();
217
218    walker.visit(moduleNodeItem, dynamicContext);
219
220    Map<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>,
221        List<AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor.AllowedValuesRecord>> allowedValuesByTarget
222            = ObjectUtils.notNull(walker.getAllowedValueLocations().stream()
223                .flatMap(location -> location.getAllowedValues().stream())
224                .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(AllowedValuesRecord::getTarget,
225                    () -> new TreeMap<>(Comparator.comparing(IDefinitionNodeItem::getMetapath)),
226                    Collectors.mapping(Function.identity(), Collectors.toUnmodifiableList()))));
227
228    generateYaml(allowedValuesByTarget, writer);
229  }
230
231  private static void generateYaml(
232      @NonNull Map<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> allowedValuesByTarget,
233      @NonNull PrintWriter writer) throws IOException {
234
235    YAMLFactoryBuilder builder = YAMLFactory.builder();
236    YAMLFactory factory = ObjectUtils.notNull(builder
237        .enable(YAMLGenerator.Feature.MINIMIZE_QUOTES)
238        .enable(YAMLGenerator.Feature.WRITE_DOC_START_MARKER)
239        .enable(YAMLGenerator.Feature.ALWAYS_QUOTE_NUMBERS_AS_STRINGS)
240        .disable(YAMLGenerator.Feature.SPLIT_LINES)
241        .build());
242
243    try (YAMLGenerator generator = factory.createGenerator(writer)) {
244
245      generator.writeStartObject(); // toplevel
246
247      writeLocations(allowedValuesByTarget, generator);
248
249      generator.writeEndObject(); // toplevel
250    }
251  }
252
253  private static void writeLocations(
254      @NonNull Map<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> allowedValuesByTarget,
255      @NonNull YAMLGenerator generator) throws IOException {
256    generator.writeFieldName("locations");
257    generator.writeStartObject(); // locations
258
259    for (Map.Entry<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> entry : allowedValuesByTarget.entrySet()) {
260      assert entry != null;
261      writeLocation(entry, generator);
262    }
263    generator.writeEndObject(); // locations
264  }
265
266  private static void writeLocation(
267      @NonNull Map.Entry<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> entry,
268      @NonNull YAMLGenerator generator) throws IOException {
269
270    IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> target = ObjectUtils.notNull(entry.getKey());
271
272    generator.writeFieldName(metapath(target));
273
274    generator.writeStartObject(); // metapath
275
276    writeLocationConstraints(entry, generator);
277
278    generator.writeEndObject(); // metapath
279  }
280
281  private static void writeLocationConstraints(
282      @NonNull Entry<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> entry,
283      @NonNull YAMLGenerator generator) throws IOException {
284    IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> target = ObjectUtils.notNull(entry.getKey());
285
286    List<AllowedValuesRecord> allowedValues = entry.getValue();
287    if (allowedValues != null) {
288      generator.writeFieldName("constraints");
289
290      generator.writeStartArray(); // constraints
291
292      for (AllowedValuesRecord record : allowedValues) {
293        assert target.equals(record.getTarget());
294
295        writeAllowedValue(record, generator);
296      }
297
298      generator.writeEndArray(); // constraints
299    }
300  }
301
302  private static void writeAllowedValue(@NonNull AllowedValuesRecord record, @NonNull YAMLGenerator generator)
303      throws IOException {
304
305    generator.writeStartObject(); // constraint
306
307    generator.writeStringField("type", "allowed-values");
308
309    IAllowedValuesConstraint constraint = record.getAllowedValues();
310    if (constraint.getId() != null) {
311      generator.writeStringField("identifier", constraint.getId());
312    }
313    generator.writeStringField("location", metapath(record.getLocation()));
314    generator.writeStringField("target", constraint.getTarget().getPath());
315
316    List<String> values = constraint.getAllowedValues().values().stream()
317        .map(IAllowedValue::getValue)
318        .collect(Collectors.toList());
319    generator.writeFieldName("values");
320    if (values == null) {
321      generator.writeNull();
322    } else {
323      generator.writeStartArray();
324      for (String value : values) {
325        generator.writeString(value);
326      }
327      generator.writeEndArray();
328    }
329
330    generator.writeBooleanField("allow-other", constraint.isAllowedOther());
331
332    URI source = constraint.getSource().getSource();
333    generator.writeStringField("source", source == null ? "builtin" : source.toString());
334
335    generator.writeEndObject(); // constraint
336  }
337
338  private static String metapath(@NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item) {
339    return metapath(item.getMetapath());
340  }
341
342  private static String metapath(@NonNull String path) {
343    // remove position 1 predicates
344    return path.replace("[1]", "");
345  }
346}
